comments.author: igor@mir2.org
comments.body:
Created attachment 120691
Removal of old naming conventions

description:
I suggest to remove in ScriptableObject.defineClass support for pre 1.5R1 method
forms to define JS properties and functions and look only methods that match the
naming conventions specified in JavaDoc for the method.
summary: Removal of support in ScriptableObject.defineClass for old method forms
